text: The Rufe Jordan Unit is a state prison for men located in Pampa, Gray County, Texas, owned by operated by the Texas Department of Criminal Justice. This facility was opened in October 1992, and has a maximum capacity of 1008 male inmates held at various security levels. ==References== Category:Prisons in Texas Category:Buildings and structures in Gray County, Texas Category:1992 establishments in Texas
title: Rufe Jordan Unit
